title: Low back pain: Moving toward mechanism-based management.
summary: Low back pain is a complex, multifactorial, and heterogeneous condition, but this does not make it an exception in medicine. Management of low back pain based on a mechanistic approach and developing more effective multidisciplinary treat â€¦
abstract: Low back pain is a complex, multifactorial, and heterogeneous condition, but this does not make it an exception in medicine. Management of low back pain based on a mechanistic approach and developing more effective multidisciplinary treatment is possible and would finally implement the biopsychosocial model of care.
